pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, December 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Special Chiefs Assembly of the Assembly of First Nations and deliver remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

The Prime Minister will meet with members of the diplomatic corps. The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mélanie Joly, will be in attendance.
